author: garyrong
content: Yep. Itâ€™s the strategy we have now. We include the withdrawals first then try to pack the txs with block size limit

author: potuz
content: I think you can safely assume it will always be the maximum size of withdrawals

author: catwith1hat
content: From my understanding of the consensus-spec, the EL is not free to make any decisions wrt withdrawals. [process_withdrawals](https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/dev/specs/electra/beacon-chain.md#modified-process_withdrawals) has `assert payload.withdrawals == expected_withdrawals`. This forces the payload to match the CL's expectation of the withdrawals, doesn't it?
